name: Cadillac Real Estate Company v. Roddy Realty, Inc., Appellant

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Cadillac Real Estate Company v. Roddy Realty, Inc., Appellant.
Argued April 30, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Donald M. Collins, with him Collins & Masterson, and Maguire and Maguire, for appellants.
Charles H. Greenberg, and Robinson, Greenberg é IApman, for appellee.
September 29, 1965:
